text: The 2013 European Mixed Team Badminton Championships were held at the Borisoglebsky Arena in Ramenskoye, Moscow Oblast, Russia, from 12–17 February 2013, and were organised by the Badminton Europe and the National Badminton Federation of Russia. ==Medalists== {| |- |Mixed Team |align=center| |align=center| |align=center| |} ==Group stage== {| class="wikitable" |+ Key to colors |- |
